name: Turu-Purupurun
desc: If this card is in your hand: You can target 1 WATER monster in your Main Monster Zone; destroy that monster you control, and if you do, Special Summon this card to the zone that monster was in, then you can destroy all opponent's face-up cards in this card's column. You can only use this effect of "Turu-Purupurun" once per turn.
